messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "We all love, love, love The Sims."
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/6/2001 12:48:05 PM Central Daylight Time, mrscalgal@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/6/2001 12:48:05 PM Central Daylight Time,
mrscalgal@... writes:

<<
OMG This game is so addicting!! My kids love it too!! I started out single
with a small house then worked my way up to a family and a huge house!! Then
our p/c crashed along with my hours,days ,months of playing :(..... >>


Hi, I have not heard of this game. Is it called The Sims?
Candace, who has been spending way to much time in the garden and is having a
hard time keeping up with the posts

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "We all love, love, love The Sims."
messages.msgSnippet: I ve always wondered if this was worth buying. Guess maybe it is. What is the best one to start with? I am so far behind because my server was having problems.
messages.messageBody:
I've always wondered if this was worth buying.
Guess maybe it is.
What is the best one to start with?
I am so far behind because my server was having problems.
I'm catching up though...maybe. ;)
Ann
